post.body: has the absolute best Twitter bio I've ever seen! LMAO etc....
The same exact way you followed them... ;)
Geez, time for a Federer revenge or what? ;)
The snow rolling is even more fun when done straight from a 120C+ smoking hot sauna... Finnish style. ;)
Oh he sure did! :-D I meant to email you about that but have been swamped after getting back after xmas.. Thx for everything!
Yup, just found him thanks! Twitter feels less like an exclusive geek party every day...
Hahahah! That's right I could always use that one... one size fits all promotional singing head... http://twurl.nl/3oqiwg
Hahah! I feel for you... ugh, need another cup of organic mocca to get that image off my mind! ;)
http://twitpic.com/x6on - The Plant? That's legendary! Stephen King's infamous ebook experiment from 2000 or so.. loved it th ...
Happy birthday @mrfire ! May it bring you increasing happiness, vibrant health and more wealth than you can imagine.
Going through the excellent Chi Kung Basics DVD again, time to 'shake' off some of that xmas overeatery... ;) http://twurl.nl/0pphsg
Spending a few minutes watching John Lennon talk (and sing) peace. This stuff hasn't aged a day! http://twurl.nl/wbnp8e
Who knew Stephen Fry was such a super-geek?! I didn't... one more fascinating blog to follow.. http://twurl.nl/4hr6a5
Paras suomalainen artikkeli aikoihin: Sadhun kuolema. Sopivaa vuoden lopun ajateltavaa... http://twurl.nl/bn8lra
Scanning through a list of top Finnish twitterati... http://tinyurl.com/9scof8
Starting to get really tired of automated DM's on follow.. usually add no value or offer anything personal. Only 1 or 2 did it right...
Planning some videos for my company site... talking head, presentation or both? Hmm... http://www.effortlessenterprises.com
Finished doing three alternate budgets for next year. The interesting thing is, the bigger the turnover, the easier it seems to do. Hmmm...
Had a nice meet with mastermind buddies @sturunen and @lassevideo yesterday, still thinking about the ramifications...
Ihailen Tykylevitsin asennetta ja pitelemättömyyttä. Ilmastouni YouTubessa: http://twurl.nl/golg4x
